attributes.action: adopt the Hague Declaration of the Digital Standards Organisation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "adopt the Hague Declaration of the Digital Standards Organisation."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page16572


Prime Minister's Office
